Description:
Temporary English-speaking Housekeeper required in Notting Hill, London, £3,750 gross per month, live-out, start 1st of September for 2 months.
A returning client is seeking a temporary housekeeper to support the running of their 5-bedroom family home, located in Notting Hill.
As a Housekeeper, you will be responsible for the upkeep of the family home. You will undertake daily duties to maintain the home to a high standard including, cleaning, washing, ironing, shopping and running errands to ensure the smooth running of the household.
In addition to this, you will be required to deep clean, and maintain the outdoor spaces, light cooking may be required when the chef is off duty. Working with outside vendors, ensuring supplies for the family home is kept up to date, and assisting the principals with packing/unpacking before and after travelling.
The ideal candidate will be a hard-working experienced housekeeper. Being a fluent English speaker is essential for this role. Previous experience working in a fully staffed household is beneficial to your application along with being a team player. You must have an eye for detail with laundry and be willing to cook light meals when the chef is off duty.
The working schedule will be from Monday to Friday, working approximately 9 am until 6 pm daily. Flexibility is required
This is a live-out position with no accommodation provided. This position is only suitable for candidates located nearby
The position is to commence 1st of September for 2 months. The role may be offered as a full-time position for the right candidate.
